plot outline: The film is all about Indian classical relationship between a grandson and a grandmother. The first frame opens with the matured grandson comes out of his house and heading to pay homage to his grandmother on her death day. On the way, he remembers the memories of his childhood with his grandmother and expresses how he misses her love and affections.
title: Paatti
